text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Immune to Fire. Illuminating if it can attack. Fire Damage. Bounces every non-flying Zombie away from it, then gets Exhausted.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Burst-shroom's bounciness can be a pain. Sure, it keeps Zombies away, but friends as well, if they weren't afraid of its flames in the first place.

pages.text: $(#25228d)Burst-shrooms bump away all Zombies that get too close.
